abstract: Dismisses the view if it is currently presented.
overview:
## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. SwiftUI calls it for you when you call the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/DismissAction] structure that you get from the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Environment]:

For information about how Swift uses the `callAsFunction()` method to simplify call site syntax, see [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Declarations.html#ID622] in *The Swift Programming Language*.
title: callAsFunction()
